Text: Hey, I'm Releasing the Hangover for the first of 2010. Very apt.
I have re-released this with an additional subtitle track containing ONLY the alien dialogue. You can get it here http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5256342

Fantastic work Ch4cal!!

Looks fantastic on my 21.5 1920x1080 LCD screen (computer)

And the audio is nice and rich: Cambridge Soundworks 2.1 THX (computer)

However if you use this file http://subscene.com/english/District-9/subtitle-274060.aspx it works/syncs perfectly!
Oh damn I should have read your last comment...my bad my bad!!

Hi, Thank you so much for this perfect rip!! 

Question: from what version has this rip been done? I've just purchased the french DVD but the french soundtrack is very different and much worse than in your version (not the same voice). I'd really like to know where I can find the same version as you.

Many thanks again! The best movie I've seen for a long time!
